summary: duncan walpole or edward kenway governer armor now standalone
descriptionHtml:
Edward Kenway from Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag have show his governer armor in Skyrim.
you can craft it at any forge misc division with name governer armor and governer hood.
it retexture from mage expert robe but it 75% accurate.
add new follower name edward kenway, using scimitar.
the replacer mod is by tomtomsatnanavv1234 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49789/?

ow.... thanks to tomtomsatnav1234 for the texture
author: juliusgeorgorius and tomtomsatnavv1234
